headline: My Assignment? Build a Glock 19
abstract: “Ghosts Guns,” assembled from kits, can be bought online and don’t have serial numbers. To learn more about them, we ordered one.
lead_paragraph: Times Insider explains who we are and what we do, and delivers behind-the-scenes insights into how our journalism comes together.
keywords: BUREAU OF ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, FIREARMS AND EXPLOSIVES
